DOC.brief_summary: To assess the analgetic effect of nitrousoxide-oxygen inhalation on pain perception in 12-15 years old children from 1) the dental pulp; 2) the masseter muscle; 3) the skin on the upper lip
DOC.brief_title: Analgetic Effect of Nitrousoxide-oxygen Inhalation for Dental Treatment of Children
DOC.detailed_description: The present study is a randomized, cross-over blinded study on the analgetic effect of nitrousoxide-oxygen on sensitivity of the dental pulp, the skin and muscles. It is conducted in healthy 12-15 year old Danish children attending public schools in the municipality of Aarhus, Denmark
DOC.criteria: ASAgroups I or II 1215 year of age sound upper central incisors difficulties breathing through the nose pregnancy trauma to test teeth
